DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the investigators study is to identify a prognostic marker that will evaluate the probability of recurrence in patients with stage 0-II breast cancer following surgery to remove the tumor.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Stem Cell Related Markers
DOC.criteria: Ductal Carcinoma in Situ DCIS + Microinvasion stages 1 or 11 without positive lymph nodes tumor specimen with higher than grade II BRACA 1 or BRACA 2 mutation Neoadjuvant chemotherapy
